org.w3c.dom.xpath.XPathException

  • Packages that use XPathException 
    Package Description
    org.w3c.dom.xpath
    Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 XPath Specification.

    • Uses of XPathException in org.w3c.dom.xpath

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Creates a parsed XPath expression with resolved namespaces.

      Evaluates an XPath expression string and returns a result of the specified type if possible.
      Object XPathExpression.evaluate​(Node contextNode, short type, Object result)
      Evaluates this XPath expression and returns a result.

      The value of this boolean result.

      The value of this number result.

      The value of this single node result, which may be null.

      The number of nodes in the result snapshot.

      Node XPathResult.iterateNext()
